_description: Mistress, be faithful!, sometimes ascribed to Skelton — five 6-line stanzas, with refrain, ‘I am merie’

CamTCC597.First Lines:
Masteres anneI ame youre manas you may well espieif you
                    will be…
CamTCC597.Note:
Added to blank front flyleaf, unnumbered, recto, by a sixteenth-century
                    hand.
